title: error when installing from source
body_html:
Hello,
I am trying to install the pytorch from source with anaconda(14.04.1-Ubuntu，cuda7.5,cudnnv5,gcc4.8.5). During installation process I am getting these errors.

[ 23%] Built target nccl_external
[ 76%] Built target gloo
[ 79%] Building NVCC (Device) object gloo/CMakeFiles/gloo_cuda.dir/nccl/gloo_cuda_generated_nccl.cu.o
[ 82%] Building NVCC (Device) object gloo/CMakeFiles/gloo_cuda.dir/gloo_cuda_generated_cuda.cu.o
[ 85%] Building NVCC (Device) object gloo/CMakeFiles/gloo_cuda.dir/gloo_cuda_generated_cuda_private.cu.o
/home/zhangyang/code/pytorch/torch/lib/gloo/gloo/common/linux.h:26:26: error: ‘__T0’ was not declared in this scope
const auto kPCIClass3D = PCIClassMatch{0x030200, 0xffff00};
^
/home/zhangyang/code/pytorch/torch/lib/gloo/gloo/common/linux.h:29:31: error: ‘__T0’ was not declared in this scope
const auto kPCIClassNetwork = PCIClassMatch{0x020000, 0xff0000};
^
CMake Error at gloo_cuda_generated_cuda_private.cu.o.cmake:263 (message):
Error generating file

I am trying to install the pytorch from source with anaconda(14.04.1-Ubuntu，cuda7.5,cudnnv5,gcc4.8.5). During installation process I am getting these errors.

body:
Hello,
     I am trying to install the pytorch from source with anaconda(14.04.1-Ubuntu，cuda7.5,cudnnv5,gcc4.8.5). During installation process I am getting these errors.


[ 23%] Built target nccl_external
[ 76%] Built target gloo
[ 79%] Building NVCC (Device) object gloo/CMakeFiles/gloo_cuda.dir/nccl/gloo_cuda_generated_nccl.cu.o
[ 82%] Building NVCC (Device) object gloo/CMakeFiles/gloo_cuda.dir/gloo_cuda_generated_cuda.cu.o
[ 85%] Building NVCC (Device) object gloo/CMakeFiles/gloo_cuda.dir/gloo_cuda_generated_cuda_private.cu.o
/home/zhangyang/code/pytorch/torch/lib/gloo/gloo/common/linux.h:26:26: error: ‘__T0’ was not declared in this scope
 const auto kPCIClass3D = PCIClassMatch{0x030200, 0xffff00};
                          ^
/home/zhangyang/code/pytorch/torch/lib/gloo/gloo/common/linux.h:29:31: error: ‘__T0’ was not declared in this scope
 const auto kPCIClassNetwork = PCIClassMatch{0x020000, 0xff0000};
                               ^
CMake Error at gloo_cuda_generated_cuda_private.cu.o.cmake:263 (message):
  Error generating file
